channel.title: Rstats on Naming things is hard
channel.description: Recent content in Rstats on Naming things is hard

item.title: Test R Post
item.author: contact@alexaxthelm.com (Alex Axthelm)
item.description: This is some plain text. myplot <- ggplot2::ggplot( data = mtcars, aes = ggplot2::aes(x = wt, y = mpg) ) + ggplot2::geom_point() + ggplot2::labs( title = "A scatterplot of mtcars", subtitle = "Look, plotting works!" )
